DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect safety drug elute balloon combine treatment unstable angina .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Eluting Balloon Treatment Unstable Angina
DOC.detailed_description: Patients unstable angina randomize drug elute stent drug elute balloon group . Angiographic follow-up perform 12 month . The primary endpoint late lumen loss ( LLL ) secondary endpoint target lesion revascularization ( TLR ) , major adverse cardiovascular event ( MACE ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients > 18 , < 80 year old , unstable angina Singlevessel doublevessel disease Length target lesion < 25mm Diameter target vessel > 2.5mm , < 3.5mm Left main disease Chronic total occlusion Severe Tortuosity Heavy calcification Severe liver failure , moderate severe kidney failure Malignant disease Active infectious disease Pregnancy breastfeeding
